name: The Parameter Matrix
description: A complex matrix of glowing symbols covers the wall. Each symbol seems to represent a different parameter that can be adjusted and combined with others.
promptTask:
Goal: Activate the matrix with the right parameter combination.
Lesson: Using multiple parameters together in prompts.
Craft a command that combines at least three different types of parameters (format, style, constraints, quantity, etc.) to configure the matrix.
successMessage: As you configure the matrix with multiple parameters - setting the format to hierarchical, limiting the quantity to five elements, and specifying a technical style - the symbols align perfectly and the wall slides open to reveal the path forward.

feedback.insufficientParameters: Parameter Count Error: Your command needs to include at least three different types of parameters. Try adding more specific configuration instructions.
feedback.sameParameterType: Parameter Variety Error: You're using multiple instances of the same parameter type. Try incorporating different types like format, style, quantity, constraints, etc.
feedback.wrongAction: Action Error: '{action}' is not the appropriate way to interact with the matrix. Try configuring or setting parameters.
feedback.noTarget: Target Error: What do you want to {action}? Specify that you're interacting with the matrix or parameter system.
feedback.wrongTarget: Target Error: There is no '{target}' here. The parameter matrix is the focal point of this chamber.
feedback.tooGeneric: Specificity Required: Your command is too generic. The matrix requires specific parameter configurations to activate.
